text: I wanna da-, I wanna dance in the lights
I wanna ro-, I wanna rock your body
I wanna go, I wanna go for a ride
Hop in the music and rock your body right
Rock that body, come on, come on, rock that body
Rock that body, come on, come on, rock that body
Rock that body, come on, come on, rock that body
Rock that body, come on, come on, rock that body
